body.p: The group of insurance contracts qualifies for the premium allocation approach applying paragraph 53(b). In addition, the entity expects that:

li.p: the time between providing each part of the coverage and the related premium due date is no more than a year. Consequently, applying paragraph 56, the entity chooses not to adjust the carrying amount of the liability for remaining coverage to reflect the time value of money and the effect of financial risk (therefore no discounting or interest accretion is applied).
